Class Card

java.lang.Object
Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Estate, GameCharacter, Weapon
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
Card represents a playing card in the game Murder Madness. It has a name, initial (symbol), and may be in an Estate (if it is a GameCharacter or Weapon). Parent class to GameCharacter, Estate, and Weapon.
Author:
johnh

  • Field Details

    • name

      public final java.lang.String name
      The Card's official name.

    • initial

      public final char initial
      The Card's defining character symbol. Shown on the board's text display.

    • estate

      private Estate estate
      The Estate the Card is in, if it is in one. Only applies to GameCharacters and Weapons.

    • inEstate

      public boolean inEstate()
      Returns if this Card is in an Estate.
      Returns:
      true if in Estate

    • getEstate

      public Estate getEstate()
      Returns the Estate the Card is in.
      Returns:
